page.title: 08CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: {PLAYGROUND GAMES The following playground games involve chasing and being caught.The children use the netball court markings for bases and 'dens'. Stuck in the Mud Bob down tig Stops and Blocks Tig on line Bulldog Semi Triangle Hop,skip and jump Bottle of poison {SKIPPING} Skipping games with rhymes are popular with the girls. Here is one such rhyme:"Cowboy Joe from Mexico, Hands up, stick them up, Drop your guns, And pick them up." {HOME} At home the most popular games are computer ones though chess and card games are still played.Some children do play with parents mainly badminton.
